spec_data.Name: bucardo
spec_data.Description:
Bucardo is an asynchronous PostgreSQL replication system, allowing for both
multi-master and multi-slave operations.It was developed at Backcountry.com
primarily by Greg Sabino Mullane of End Point Corporation.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:41:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Postgres replication system for both multi-master and multi-slave operations
